name: ScarefestRadio
0:
”Alexa, open Scarefest Radio”
”Alexa, start Scarefest Radio”
”Alexa, ask Scarefest Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scarefest radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
From the nation's PREMIER horror and paranormal convention: The Scarefest! The ScareFest features many top stars and celebrities of the horror, paranormal communities, and SciFi who bring in thousands of adoring fans. 

The event features over 70 seminars, workshops, panels and movie screenings. Over 250 different and unique dealers will be offering the strange and bizarre in horror merchandise, along with metaphysical tools and unusual mystic merchandise. Lots of psychic readers, intuitive healers and aura photographers will be offering their services as well.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Scarefest Radio to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Scarefest Radio to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
